infotexts.afflictiondescription.tinkerexhaustion_m: Subject feels tired and needs rest, use bed or chair to rest. Either use medical drugs to ease the symptoms, or use a rag doll.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.stamina: Speed and movement reduced, stop to restore stamina. Anabolic steroids can prolong stamina.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoshelf_mod_b: Convenient way to store large ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.flashlight_weapons: Flashlight used for mounting on a weapon
infotexts.entitydescription.cassette_recorder: Play your favorite music while traveling
infotexts.entityname.cassette_bobbyhelms_jinglebel: Cassette Bobby Helms - Jingle Bells Rock
infotexts.entityname.cassette_brendalee_rockinarou: Cassette Brenda Lee - Rockin 'Around the Christmas Tree
infotexts.entityname.cassette_eltonjohn_stepintoch: Cassette Elton John - Step Into Christmas
infotexts.entityname.cassette_franksinatra_letitsn: Cassette Frank Sinatra - Let It Snow
infotexts.entityname.cassette_maddiepoppe_rockinar: Cassette Maddie Poppe - Rockin 'Around the Christmas Tree
infotexts.entityname.cassette_queen_thankgoditschr: Cassette Queen - Thank God It's Christmas
infotexts.entitydescription.physicoriumammobox_big: Magnetic cannon ammunition made from alien material.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoboxexplosiv: Magnetic cannon shells. Explodes on collision with a target.
infotexts.entitydescription.pulselaserammobox_big: A capsule with specially selected reagents and a focusing lens. Suitable for creating powerful bursts of energy. Used as ammunition for a Pulse Laser.
infotexts.entitydescription.pulselaserammoboxtrila: A crate containing a solution of special chemicals and ingredients. The lens divides the laser beam into three, allowing you to hit multiple targets at once.
infotexts.entityname.chaingunammoboxphysicorium_bi: Large Physicorium Ammo for Chain Cannon
infotexts.entitydescription.chaingunammoboxphysico: An incredibly heavy crate of Chainship Cannon projectiles made from Physicorium. The stopping power of these projectiles is such that they can stun any target.
infotexts.entitydescription.underwaterscooter_sona: Battery operated underwater transport device. Contains sonar.
infotexts.entitydescription.cargoscooter_sonar: An underwater scooter for transporting materials underwater. Contains sonar. The scooter is too big to fit in your inventory, but its neutral buoyancy allows it to stay where you drop it.
infotexts.entitydescription.turrethardpoint_mod: An empty combat module to which a weapon can be placed.
infotexts.entitydescription.crosshairs_weapons_gol: Holographic sight for mounting on some types of weapons. Use the fabricator to install
Holographic sight with a flashlight for mounting on some types of weapons. Use the fabricator to install
infotexts.entitydescription.crosshairs_weapons_opt: Optical sight for mounting on some types of weapons. Use the fabricator to install
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshell_c4: Required for firing the railgun. Increased damage power
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshell_c4plus: Required for firing a railgun. Increased charge with a higher hit area.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearshell_plus: A nuclear charge for a railgun. Enhanced nuclear charge
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoshelf_mod_b: A convenient way to store large ammunition.
